review: I love amazon prime But Roku has a easier more friendly format to navigate.PROS:It is Fast! Almost no waiting for a show to load.The Voice search is awesome With this feature and its accuracy you should never have to use an onscreen keyboard again.Easy to buy or rent anything, It's to easy please read the Cons list about this.CONS:On the home screen they offer you many options and recommendations for only amazon content. Its hard to navigate to find competitive channels like Netflix, Crackle, PBS kids,  ect... . My Roku 3 was easier to navigate and played friendly with all channels, I even liked the amazon prime on the Roku better. It didn't try to sell me anything it showed me the free content first, thats why I pay for my prime membership.Once inside a "Show or movie" they give you many options to buy it whether its free or not. The layout is confusing my first day I couldn't find how to play a free movie but they offered for me to buy it and save it. Example my 5yo son accidentally purchased 5 programs because he clicked "Buy episode" link directly below a picture of a FREE the program. Why would they give a Free kids program an option to buy if its free, With prime I have unlimited access to watching it FREE! Amazons solution is to sell me another subscription for kid friendly free content called "Free Time" for an extra $3 month (looks similar to roku), or set up the parental controls with pin numbers. :/I would wait a year till amazon straightens out the software, but I would highly recommend the roku 3 I still have it and prefer to use that one!
